note: 7th decade of trying to find the right path in life. Currently working in a primary school supporting autistic children. Life is beautiful! Love Pink Floyd Schostokovitch Led Zeppelin Pink Floyd again great film scores ELP and you can’t beat Pink Floyd. I am a small speck on a planet, which is a tiny speck in a solar system, which is a minuscule speck in a galaxy that is one among trillions of galaxies. It puts life’s trials into perspective.
